title: Breadcrumbs
description: Secondary navigation showing location within site hierarchy

frontMatter.title: Breadcrumbs
frontMatter.description: Secondary navigation showing location within site hierarchy

when_to_use.value: **Multi-level hierarchies**: Pages existing in structures with three or more levels
**Consistency across similar pages**: When parallel sections use breadcrumbs, implement them uniformly
**Persistent display**: Breadcrumbs should appear starting at level 2 pages and continue through all child pages

when_to_consider_else.value: Pages using the minimal header component (to prevent user distraction)

content_considerations.value: Home page label should be "VA.gov home" (not abbreviated as "Home")
Use full page titles for each segmentâ€”avoid truncation
All segments, including the current page, must be interactive links

accessibility.value: Every breadcrumb segment must be a focusable, interactive link

frontMatter.code_usage:
<va-breadcrumbs
  :breadcrumb-list='[
    {"label": "VA.gov home", "href": "/"},
    {"label": "Health care", "href": "/health-care"},
    {"label": "Apply for VA health care", "href": "/health-care/apply"}
  ]'
></va-breadcrumbs>
